CreateClassTable: CREATE TABLE classes (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,class TEXT)
CreateDictBuildTable: CREATE TABLE dictbuild (sample_id INTEGER, dict_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY(sample_id) REFERENCES emails(id), FOREIGN KEY(dict_id) REFERENCES dictlist(id),UNIQUE(sample_id, dict_id));
CreateDictTable: CREATE TABLE %s (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,word TEXT UNIQUE,counter INTEGER)
CreateDictListTable: CREATE TABLE dictlist (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,dictname TEXT UNIQUE,humanname TEXT)
CreateFeatureTable: CREATE TABLE features (sample_id INTEGER, wordlist_id INTEGER, featurevec BLOB, UNIQUE(sample_id,wordlist_id) )
CreateSampleTable: CREATE TABLE emails ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, filename TEXT UNIQUE, header TEXT, body TEXT, class_id INTEGER, set_id INTEGER, orderint INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY(class_id) REFERENCES classes(id), FOREIGN KEY(set_id) REFERENCES sets(id) )
CreateSetTable: CREATE TABLE sets (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,setname TEXT)
CreateWordList: CREATE TABLE %s (word_id INTEGER UNIQUE,FOREIGN KEY(word_id) REFERENCES %s(id))
CreateWordLists: CREATE TABLE wordlists (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, dict_id INTEGER, listname TEXT UNIQUE, humanname TEXT,FOREIGN KEY(dict_id) REFERENCES dictlist(id))
GetXY: SELECT featurevec,class_id FROM features INNER JOIN emails ON sample_id=id WHERE wordlist_id=? AND set_id=? ORDER BY orderint,id ASC LIMIT ? OFFSET ?;
InsertAllWordsToDict: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO %s (word, counter) VALUES (?,1)
InsertDict: INSERT INTO dictlist (id, dictname, humanname) VALUES (?,?,?)
InsertWordList: INSERT INTO wordlists (id, dict_id, listname, humanname) VALUES (?,?,?,?)
InsertWords: INSERT INTO %s (word_id) SELECT id FROM %s WHERE counter >= ? AND counter <= ?
SampleSetCount: SELECT count(*) FROM emails WHERE set_id = ?
SelectClassID: SELECT id FROM classes WHERE class = ? LIMIT 1
SelectDictID: SELECT id FROM dictlist WHERE dictname = ? LIMIT 1
SelectDictRef: SELECT dict_id FROM wordlists WHERE id=?
SelectDictTable: SELECT dictname FROM dictlist WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
SelectFeatures: SELECT word FROM %s INNER JOIN %s ON id=word_id ORDER BY word
SelectNewTrainingBodies: SELECT id,body FROM emails WHERE set_id=0 AND id NOT IN (SELECT sample_id FROM dictbuild WHERE dict_id=?)
SelectSetID: SELECT id FROM sets WHERE setname = ? LIMIT 1
SelectTrainingBodies: SELECT id,body FROM emails WHERE set_id=0
SelectWordList: SELECT listname FROM wordlists WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
SelectWordListID: SELECT id FROM wordlists WHERE listname = ? LIMIT 1
SelectWords: SELECT word FROM %s WHERE id IN (SELECT word_id FROM %s WHERE dict_id=?)
TransferDict: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO %s (id,word,counter) SELECT id,word,counter FROM %s
TransferFeatures: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO features (sample_id,wordlist_id,featurevec) SELECT sample_id,wordlist_id,featurevec FROM %s
TransferUsed: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO dictbuild (sample_id,dict_id) SELECT sample_id,dict_id FROM %s
UpdateWordCount: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO %s (word, counter) VALUES (?,?)
